```{r}
example1 <- c("John", "Mary", "Bill")
```

```{r}
example1[[2]]
example1[[4]]
example1[[4]] <- "Ken"
```

```{r}
example1[[4]]
```
```{r}
example1[["person5"]] <- "Jane"
```
```{r}
example1[[6]]
example1[[6]] <- c("person6"="Kenny")
#可發現右手邊取element name，沒有效果，可以比較person5
```
```{r}
example1
```
```{r}
example1[c(7, 8)]
example1[c(1, 2)]
example1[c(7, 8)] <- c("Ellison", "David")
```

```{r}
example1
```
```{r}
example1[c("person9", "person10")] <- c("Andy", "Candy")
```

```{r}
example1 #有element name，只要取的東西不存在，則就會新增
```

```{r}
example1[c(1, 11)] <- c("Johnny", "Grill")
#新增加上取代
```

